channel.title: 183rd Annual General Conference

itunes:owner.itunes:name: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints

channel.itunes:author: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints

item.title: Welcome to Conference
item.description:
Welcome to Conference by President Thomas S. Monson, President of the Church given in the Saturday Morning session of the 183rd Annual General Conference on Sun Mar 31 2013
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: President Thomas S. Monson, President of the Church
